```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
data.files <- list.files('data', full.names = T)
data.tables <- lapply(data.files, function(file){
  data.table <- fromJSON(file)
  return(data.table)
})
all.data <- bind_rows(data.tables)
```


```{r}
task.data <- all.data %>% filter(task == 'respond')
```
